entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries mixed with periods of rain early this evening and ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
